welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Newmarket, a charming town known for its rich history and vibrant community! We invite you to explore our quaint shops, lively restaurants, and beautiful parks and enjoy all that Newmarket has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pease International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Pease International Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lawrence Airport serves all commercial flights and houses a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Lawrence Airport caters to private and chartered flights, offering exclusive services and facilities for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Manchester-Boston Regional Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The south terminal at Manchester-Boston Regional Airport serves regional and commuter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sanford Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Sanford Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminal.
